```{r}
a <- array(1:20, c(2,2,5))
a

apply(a, 1, identity)

apply(a, 2, identity)

apply(a, 3, identity)
```


```{r}
dim <- c(x=3, y=4, z=5)
a <- array(1:60, dim)
a
```


```{r}
# by rows
cat("\ by rows \n")
vapply(1:dim(a)[1], function(i) identity(a[i, ,]), a[1, ,])

cat("\n by columns \n")
# by columns
vapply(1:dim(a)[2], function(i) identity(a[, i,]), a[, 1,])

# by slices
cat("\n by slices (same as the original\n")
vapply(1:dim(a)[3], function(i) identity(a[, ,i]), a[, ,1])
```


```{r}
dim.n <- lapply(1:length(dim), function(x) paste(names(dim)[x], seq(len=dim[x]), sep="_"))
vapply(dimnames(a)[[1]], function(i) identity(a[i, ,]), a[1, ,])
```
